item.Q:
Write the character:
to set; to fix; to determine; to decide; to order
item.A:
dìng
一定 yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular

item.Q:
Write the character:
point; dot; (decimal) point); a little; o'clock; (classifier for small indeterminate quantities, jot); to order (food in a restaurant); (downwards-right convex character stroke)
item.A:
traditional: 點
diǎn
特点 (特點) tèdiǎn characteristic (feature); trait; feature

item.Q:
Write the character:
feeling; emotion; passion; situation
item.A:
qíng
情况 (情況) qíngkuàng circumstances; state of affairs; situation

item.Q:
Write the character:
his; her; its; theirs; that; such; it (refers to sth preceding it)
item.A:
qí
其他 qítā other; the others; else; other than (that person); in addition to the person mentioned above

item.Q:
Write the character:
topic; subject; to inscribe; to superscribe
item.A:
traditional: 題
tí
问题 (問題) wèntí question; problem; issue; topic

item.Q:
Write the character:
matter; thing; item; work; affair
item.A:
shì
事业 (事業) shìyè undertaking; project; activity; (charitable, political or revolutionary) cause; publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation

item.Q:
Write the character:
branch of study; administrative section; division; field; branch; stage directions; family (taxonomy); rules; laws; to mete out (punishment); to levy (taxes etc); to fine sb
item.A:
kē
科学 (科學) kēxué science; scientific knowledge; scientific

item.Q:
Write the character:
square; quadrilateral; direction; one side; just; surname
item.A:
fāng
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character:
some; few; several; (a measure word)
item.A:
xiē
这些 (這些) zhèxiē these

item.Q:
Write the character:
clear; distinct; complete; pure; dynasty (1644-1911)
item.A:
清 (strokes unavailable)
qīng
清楚 qīngchu clear; clearly understood; distinct

sān
三角形 sānjiǎoxíng triangle

item.Q:
Write the character:
manner; pattern; way; appearance; shape
item.A:
traditional: 樣
yàng
这样 (這樣) zhèyàng this (kind of, sort of); this way; such; like this; such

cǐ
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (modal particle indicating polite suggestion); ...right?; ...OK?
2: (onomat.); dumb
item.A: 1: ba 2: bā

item.Q:
Write the character:
position; location; (classifier for people); place; seat
item.A:
wèi
单位 (單位) dānwèi a unit; unit (of measure); work unit (one's workplace)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to do; to make; to regard as; to take sb for
item.A:
zuò
工作 gōngzuò job; work; construction; task

item.Q:
Write the character:
reason; logic; science; inner principle or structure
item.A:
lǐ
管理 guǎnlǐ to supervise; to manage; to administer; management; administration

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: all right; capable; competent; OK; okay; to go; to do; to travel; temporary; to walk; to go; will do
2: a row; profession; professional
item.A:
1: xíng 2: háng
进行 (進行) jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute 银行 (銀行) yínháng bank

item.Q:
Write the character:
-ist, -er (person); person (who does sth)
item.A:
zhě
或者 huòzhě or; possibly; maybe; perhaps

classics; sacred book; scripture; to pass through; to undergo; longitude; surname

jīng

item.Q:
Write the character: jīng
(jīngjì de jīng)
item.A:
traditional: 經
classics; sacred book; scripture; to pass through; to undergo; longitude; surname Jing
经济 (經濟) jīngjì economy; economic
gōngzuò job; work; construction; task

traditional: 問題
wèntí question; problem; issue; topic

traditional: 這樣
zhèyàng this (kind of, sort of); this way; such; like this; such

traditional: 這些
zhèxie these
zhèxiē these
yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason
zuòyòng action; activity; actions; acts; effect; to play a role
fāngfǎ method; way; means
yīdìng surely; certainly; necessarily; fixed; a certain (extent etc); given; particular
yīxiē some; a few; a little
qítā other; the others; else; other than (that person); in addition to the person mentioned above

traditional: 經過
jīngguò to pass; to go through; process; course
dìfang area; place; local

traditional: 作為
zuòwéi accomplish; action; to regard (sth as sth); to look upon (sth as); conduct
qízhōng among; in; included among these

traditional: 科學
kēxué science; scientific knowledge; scientific
yǒuxiē some; somewhat

traditional: 同樣
tóngyàng same; equal; equivalent
dìwèi position; status; place
nàxiē those

traditional: 行為
xíngwéi action; conduct; behavior; activity
